attributes.action: Bring back the Beauty of London’s Historic Albert Bridge and save it.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a matter of urgency replace the so called ‘Temporary’ (September 05) ugly red and white plastic barriers with something more aesthetic to the splendour of the original Victorian design.  And then carry on the fight that Sir John Betjeman began for serious financial investment to be made to save the structure and make the bridge safe (currently in the region of £6 million as advised by the Royal Borough of Kensington & Chelsea).  Act now to save London’s heritage.
